author: oising
body:
win10/x64 v2004
powershell 7.0.1

Splitting on a colon:

```powershell
C:\> "ab:cd:ef" -split ":"
ab
cd
ef
```

Looks good. But split on a bar/pipe?

```powershell
C:\> "ab|cd|ef" -split "|"

a
b
|
c
d
|
e
f
```
It splits on each character.

comments.author: oising
comments.body: Never mind -- it's being treated as regex. I'm an idiot.

title: Using pipe/bar as a separator for splitting strings doesn't work as expected
